email_subject: Shopping for an affordable gaming PC? (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The body of the email is in HTML format and contains promotional content for various computer products, including desktops and laptops, as well as peripherals like printers, tablets, and monitors. It also includes links to product reviews, price comparisons, and special features. The email is designed as a newsletter with sections for featured products, most popular items, special features, and links to other CNET network resources.
